summary: As a proactive intern at iTalent India, I contributed effectively in a dynamic environment, gaining hands-on experience with a range of web development technologies.
I worked on PHP, Laravel, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, and MySQL, where I demonstrated adaptability and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions.

testimonialsList.name: Salaad Nur
testimonialsList.testimony: I have worked with Madhav on a complex Cash Management solution for Consero Global. He is a consummate professional who understands complex projects. He was a key resource for deliverables. The business need was to manage cash processes for 200+ clients, with combined volumes of tens of thousands of transactions daily, within a 4 hour window. With his support, we delivered a solution that allowed clients to get their updated cash positions by the start of their business day. I would recommend Madhav to anyone looking for a highly skilled developer.
